ayah_english: And verily We have placed in the heavens constellations and We have beautified it for the observers

ayah: وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ مَدَدۡنَٰهَا وَأَلۡقَيۡنَا فِيهَا رَوَٰسِيَ وَأَنۢبَتۡنَا فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ مَّوۡزُونٖ
ayah_translit: wal-arda madadnaha wa-alqayna fiha rawasiya wa-anbatna fiha min kulli shayin mawzunin
ayah_english: And the earth We have spread it and [We] cast therein firm mountains and [We] caused to grow therein of every thing well-balanced

ayah: وَإِن مِّن شَيۡءٍ إِلَّا عِندَنَا خَزَآئِنُهُۥ وَمَا نُنَزِّلُهُۥٓ إِلَّا بِقَدَرٖ مَّعۡلُومٖ
ayah_translit: wa-in min shayin illa indana khazainuhu wama nunazziluhu illa biqadarin ma'lumin
ayah_english: And not (is) any thing but with Us (are) its treasures and not We send it down except in a measure known

ayah: وَأَرۡسَلۡنَا ٱلرِّيَٰحَ لَوَٰقِحَ فَأَنزَلۡنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ فَأَسۡقَيۡنَٰكُمُوهُ وَمَآ أَنتُمۡ لَهُۥ بِخَٰزِنِينَ
ayah_translit: wa-arsalna al-riyaha lawaqiha fa-anzalna mina al-samai maan fa-asqaynakumuhu wama antum lahu bikhazinina
ayah_english: And We have sent the winds fertilizing and We sent down from the sky water and We gave it to you to drink And not you of it (are) retainers

ayah: وَإِذۡ قَالَ رَبُّكَ لِلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ إِنِّي خَٰلِقُۢ بَشَرٗا مِّن صَلۡصَٰلٖ مِّنۡ حَمَإٖ مَّسۡنُونٖ

ayah_translit: fa-idha sawwaytuhu wanafakhtu fihi min ruhi faqa'u lahu sajidina

ayah: قَالَ رَبِّ بِمَآ أَغۡوَيۡتَنِي لَأُزَيِّنَنَّ لَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَأُغۡوِيَنَّهُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ
ayah_translit: qala rabbi bima aghwaytani la-uzayyinanna lahum fi al-ardi wala-ugh'wiyannahum ajma'ina

ayah: قَالُواْ بَلۡ جِئۡنَٰكَ بِمَا كَانُواْ فِيهِ يَمۡتَرُونَ
ayah_translit: qalu bal ji'naka bima kanu fihi yamtaruna
ayah_english: They said Nay we have come to you with what they were in it disputing

ayah: وَأَتَيۡنَٰكَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَإِنَّا لَصَٰدِقُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-ataynaka bil-haqi wa-inna lasadiquna
ayah_english: And we have come to you with the truth and indeed we surely (are) truthful

ayah: فَأَسۡرِ بِأَهۡلِكَ بِقِطۡعٖ مِّنَ ٱلَّيۡلِ وَٱتَّبِعۡ أَدۡبَٰرَهُمۡ وَلَا يَلۡتَفِتۡ مِنكُمۡ أَحَدٞ وَٱمۡضُواْ حَيۡثُ تُؤۡمَرُونَ
ayah_translit: fa-asri bi-ahlika biqit'in mina al-layli wa-ittabi' adbarahum wala yaltafit minkum ahadun wa-im'du haythu tu'maruna
ayah_english: So travel with your family in a portion of the night and follow their backs and not let look back among you anyone and go on where you are ordered

ayah_translit: walaqad ataynaka sab'an mina al-mathani wal-qur'ana al-'azima
ayah_english: And certainly We have given you seven of the oft-repeated and the Quran Great

ayah: لَا تَمُدَّنَّ عَيۡنَيۡكَ إِلَىٰ مَا مَتَّعۡنَا بِهِۦٓ أَزۡوَٰجٗا مِّنۡهُمۡ وَلَا تَحۡزَنۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَٱخۡفِضۡ جَنَاحَكَ لِلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
ayah_translit: la tamuddanna aynayka ila ma matta'na bihi azwajan min'hum wala tahzan alayhim wa-ikh'fid janahaka lil'mu'minina
ayah_english: (Do) not extend your eyes towards what We have bestowed with it (to) categories of them and (do) not grieve over them And lower your wing to the believers

ayah_english: (Do) not extend your eyes towards what We have bestowed with it (to) categories of them and (do) not grieve over them And lower your wing to the believers
